species.name: krookodile
descriptions: After clamping down with its powerful jaws, it twists its body around to rip its prey in half.
It can expand the focus of its eyes, enabling it to see objects in the far distance as if it were using binoculars.
It conceals itself in sandstorms that Flygon whip up and waits patiently for prey to appear.
Its unique faculty of sight can detect small prey more than 30 miles away, even in the midst of a sandstorm.
They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: moxie
abilities.effect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pok√©mon.

abilities.name: anger-point
abilities.effect: Raises Attack to the maximum of six stages upon receiving a critical hit.
